name: Level Thumbnails
description: Adds thumbnails to levels in search.

show-in-browser.name: Enable Thumbnails
show-in-browser.description: Enables thumbnails in the <cy>Level Browser</c> and <cy>Search Results</c>. Doesn't affect the <cy>Level Page</c> background.

thumbnailButton.name: Enable Thumbnail Button
thumbnailButton.description: Adds a <cj>button</c> in the <cy>Level Page</c> that lets you view the thumbnail of the level you are currently on.

lists-levels-limit-enabled.name: Enable Thumbnail Limit In Lists
lists-levels-limit-enabled.description:
Allows you to <cy>limit</c> the amount of thumbnails shown in level lists.
<cy>Enable this setting if you experience lag when loading larger lists.</c>

lists-levels-limit.name: Thumbnail Limit
lists-levels-limit.description: Sets the <cy>limit</c> of levels to fetch and render thumbnails for, starting from the <cj>top</c>.

enable-thumbnail-taking.name: In-Game Thumbnail Taking
enable-thumbnail-taking.description: Enables the ability to take thumbnails and upload them to the server from the pause menu.

cache-limit.name: Thumbnail Cache Limit
cache-limit.description: The amount of thumbnails that are cached in memory (Lower this if you have a low amount of available memory).

level-thumbnails-api.name: Level Thumbnails API URL
level-thumbnails-api.description: Base URL for the API that provides the thumbnails. Leave default for original.

legacy-url.name: Legacy Host
legacy-url.description: Enable this to use the API in legacy mode (raw PNGs) instead of the new format.

level-bg.name: Enable Background
level-bg.description: Enable displaying thumbnails as the background in the online level screen.

level-bg-quality.name: Image Quality
level-bg-quality.description: The quality of the thumbnail used for the background (setting this to low uses the already downloaded thumbnail, having blur enabled forces this to low).

blur-strength.name: Blur Radius
blur-strength.description: How blurred the background will be.
